mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD_EXPENSE (SEQ, ID, WDATE, MONEYTYPE, PRICE, SHOPNAME, BCATEGORY, SCATEGORY ) VALUES (card_expense_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{wdate}, #{moneytype}, #{price}, #{shopname}, #{bcategory}, #{scategory})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CARD_EXPENSE WHERE ID = #{id} AND WDATE LIKE #{wdates}||'%' ORDER BY WDATE
